mapper.insert: INSERT INTO like_list_db (board_id, user_id, grade, regdate, update_date) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{grade}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: select avg(grade) from like_list_db where board_id = #{boardId} group by board_id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM like_list_db WHERE user_id = #{userId} and board_id = #{boardId}
